description: With comfortable versatility at its core, the classic Norrøna warm2 Hood is a timeless hoodie offering warmth and comfort on any adventure. The warm2 Hood is a clean, comfortable hoodie perfect for everyday expeditions. Made from high-quality recycled polyester knitted fleece, with a minimalist design, this premium norrøna hoodie will slide into any outfit choice, regardless of your activity.
name: Norrona Norrona Warm2 Hood - Mens
